item.title: 达特茅斯学院宣布将从 2029 届本科生申请者开始恢复标准化考试要求。
item.description: Dartmouth College announced it will reinstate the standardized testing requirement beginning with undergraduate applicants for the Class of 2029. trib.al/bGLccoU

item.title: 公司领导在接受 @GMA 采访时宣布，Meta 将开始标记 OpenAI 和其他人工智能产品创建的图像。
item.description: Meta will begin labeling images created by OpenAI and other artificial intelligence products, company leadership announced in an interview with @GMA. trib.al/B4Hi5VB

item.title: 科学家宣布在苏格兰的斯凯岛上发现了一具带翅膀的恐龙骨架。
item.description: Scientists have announced the discovery of a winged dinosaur skeleton that was found on the Isle of Skye in Scotland. trib.al/kZv1QOg

item.title: 特别顾问已经完成了对拜登总统处理机密文件的调查，但他否认了证人查阅报告草案的努力。
item.description: The special counsel has finished his probe into Pres. Biden's handling of classified documents — but he's denied witnesses' efforts to review a draft of the report. trib.al/6DSSemv

item.title:
科学家们在土星一颗最具传奇色彩的卫星下发现了一个新形成的海洋。
这一发现可能会改变科学家们对海洋卫星的定义，也会改变可居住性的条件。
了解更多：
item.description:
Scientists have discovered a newly formed ocean under one of Saturn's most storied moons.

It's a finding that could change the way scientists define ocean moons as well as the conditions for habitability.

Learn more: trib.al/9RKhGJj

item.title:
罗娜-麦克丹尼尔（Ronna McDaniel）角色的不确定性以及 RNC 的总体方向，正在特朗普为可能与总统乔-拜登（Joe Biden）的大选之战做准备之际上演。
以下是麦克丹尼尔下台对总统大选的影响。
item.description:
The uncertainty over Ronna McDaniel's role and the RNC's direction in general is playing out as Trump gears up for a likely general election battle against President Joe Biden.

Here's how McDaniel stepping down could impact the presidential election.
trib.al/t99j8k7

item.title: 在阿拉伯和穆斯林学生对哈佛大学提出民权申诉后，教育部对该校可能存在的歧视行为展开了调查。
item.description: The Department of Education has opened an investigation into Harvard for possible discrimination after Arab and Muslim students filed a civil rights complaint against the university. trib.al/zjLh7e6

item.title:
飓风专家们正在讨论在目前的飓风等级中增加一个六级，以强调随着海水持续变暖，出现更强风暴的可能性越来越大。
了解更多信息：
item.description:
Hurricane experts are debating adding a Category 6 on the current scale to highlight the increasing possibility of stronger storms as ocean waters continue to warm.

Learn more: trib.al/bTF9xYY

item.title: 罗伯特-德尼罗坦言自己是七个孩子的父亲。
item.description: Robert De Niro is opening up about being a dad of seven. trib.al/c2QiELM

item.title: 根据纽约联邦储备银行本周公布的数据，美国人的信用卡余额攀升至 1.13 万亿美元，创历史新高。
item.description: Americans' credit card balances climbed to a new record high $1.13 trillion, according to data released this week by the Federal Reserve Bank of New York. trib.al/wE5cXJO

item.title: 这只驼鹿决定到怀俄明州杰克逊霍尔的滑雪胜地试滑。
item.description: This moose decided to test out the slopes at a ski resort in Jackson Hole, Wyoming. abcn.ws/3OxZqtm

item.title: 由于通货膨胀导致的物价上涨、经济适用房短缺以及大流行病救济的结束，这场危机愈演愈烈。
item.description: A record number of Americans are struggling with unaffordable rent increases, a crisis fueled by rising prices from inflation, a shortage of affordable housing and the end of pandemic relief. trib.al/HLam9hj

item.title: 夏威夷的一项新法案旨在禁止外国人在阿罗哈州购买土地。
item.description: A new bill in Hawaii aims to ban foreigners from purchasing land in the Aloha State. trib.al/rQ68zcv

item.title:
周二，一名男子在佛罗里达州美国银行分行劫持了两人作为人质，一名副警长开枪将其击毙。
据李县治安官办公室称，嫌疑人用刀抵住一名人质的喉咙，并声称有炸弹。
item.description:
A deputy shot and killed a man Tuesday after he took two people hostage at a Bank of America branch in Florida, authorities say.

The suspect held a knife to one hostage's throat and claimed to have a bomb, according to the Lee County Sheriff's Office. trib.al/rmO93qP

item.title:
莫阿娜 2》初体验在此。
本周三，华特迪士尼公司首席执行官鲍勃-艾格（Bob Iger）通过一段新的预告视频宣布了即将上映的续集的上映日期。点击这里观看：
迪斯尼是 ABC News 和 "早安美国 "的母公司。
item.description:
A first look at "Moana 2" is here.

On Wednesday, Walt Disney Company CEO Bob Iger announced the release date for the upcoming sequel with a new video teaser. Watch it here: trib.al/ZxLdJ0B

Disney is the parent company of ABC News and "Good Morning America."

item.title: 根据无党派的国会预算办公室周三发布的最新预测，联邦政府创纪录的国债规模将进一步扩大，到2034年将达到54万亿美元。
item.description: The federal government's record-high national debt is set to get even bigger, reaching a massive $54 trillion by the year 2034, according to a new forecast released Wednesday by the nonpartisan Congressional Budget Office. trib.al/ytRThoN

item.title: 在美国国家航空航天局朱诺号宇宙飞船拍摄的新图像中，火热的火山活动在木星的卫星木卫一上喷发。
item.description: Fiery volcanic activity is seen erupting across Jupiter's moon, Io, in new images captured by NASA's Juno spacecraft. trib.al/6CxzQc9

item.title: 司法部长梅里克-加兰（Merrick Garland）已通知国会领导人，特别顾问罗伯特-赫尔（Robert Hur）已结束对拜登总统处理机密文件的调查。
item.description: Attorney General Merrick Garland has informed congressional leaders that special counsel Robert Hur has concluded his probe into President Biden's handling of classified documents. trib.al/WBzgIL4

item.title: 南卡罗来纳州前州长尼基-黑利（Nikki Haley）试图撇清她在内华达州初选中 "没有一位候选人 "屈居第二的事实，并表示她的竞选重点是其他更大的州。
item.description: Former South Carolina Gov. Nikki Haley sought to brush off the fact that she came in second to "none of these candidates" in the Nevada primary and said her campaign focus is on other, bigger states. trib.al/2ycQWgQ

item.title:
美国官员周三表示，两名警察在接到宾夕法尼亚州一处住宅可能有未成年人受伤的紧急电话时遭到枪击。
一个 911 报警电话称，一名 11 岁的孩子 "可能 "在东兰斯多恩（East Lansdowne）的住宅内遭到枪击。
item.description:
Two officers were shot while responding to an emergency call about a possibly injured minor at a Pennsylvania residence, officials said Wednesday.

A 911 caller reported that an 11-year-old was "possibly shot" at the residence in East Lansdowne.
trib.al/evzfCBF

item.title: 瑞恩-高斯林（Ryan Gosling）说，还没有人邀请他在奥斯卡颁奖典礼上表演，但他并不反对。
item.description: Ryan Gosling says he hasn't been asked yet to perform at the Oscars — but he's not opposed to it. trib.al/IgGmtjB

item.title:
"Taylor Swift：华特迪士尼公司周三在一份新闻稿中宣布，"The Eras Tour (Taylor's Version) "将于 3 月 15 日在 Disney+ 独家首发。
迪斯尼是 ABC News 和 "早安美国 "的母公司。
item.description:
"Taylor Swift: The Eras Tour (Taylor's Version)" will debut exclusively on Disney+ March 15, the Walt Disney Co. announced Wednesday in a news release.

Disney is the parent company of ABC News and "Good Morning America."
trib.al/hAKWUVr

item.title:
在美国宇航局 "朱诺 "号宇宙飞船拍摄的新图像中，可以看到火热的火山活动在木星的卫星木卫一上喷发。
美国宇航局的轨道飞行器在距离木卫一约 930 英里的范围内拍摄到了两股从月球表面喷向太空的双火山羽流。
item.description:
In new images captured by NASA's Juno spacecraft, fiery volcanic activity is seen erupting across Jupiter's moon, Io.

NASA's orbiter came within about 930 miles of Io and captured two twin volcanic plumes spewing into space from the moon's surface. trib.al/cBBiY7o

item.title: 拜登总统的高级助手计划于周四在密歇根州会见穆斯林和阿拉伯裔美国领导人，因为他对以色列-哈马斯战争的反应继续受到这些群体以及一些进步和年轻选民的尖锐批评。
item.description: Pres. Biden’s senior aides plan to meet with Muslim and Arab American leaders in Michigan on Thursday, as he continues to face sharp criticism from those groups — as well as some progressive and younger voters — for his response to the Israel-Hamas war. trib.al/PgWR2EL

item.title: 周三，西班牙数千名农民举行了第二天的拖拉机示威游行，封锁了高速公路，要求改变农业政策，采取措施应对生产成本上升和干旱，这与欧洲各地的抗议活动如出一辙。
item.description: Mirroring protests across Europe, thousands of farmers in Spain staged a second day of tractor demonstrations Wednesday, blocking highways to demand changes in farming policies and measures to combat production cost hikes and drought. trib.al/MJVXLII

item.title: 查尔斯国王的长子、王位继承人威廉王子周三在温莎城堡代替父亲主持了授位仪式。
item.description: Prince William, the eldest son of King Charles and heir to the throne, stepped in for his father Wednesday at Windsor Castle, leading an investiture ceremony. trib.al/ahe87UF

item.title: 召回：由于传感器存在故障，可能导致前排乘客安全气囊在不应该充气的情况下充气，本田将在美国召回超过 75 万辆汽车。
item.description: RECALL: Honda is recalling more than 750,000 vehicles in the U.S. due to a faulty sensor that may cause the front passenger air bags to inflate when they're not supposed to. trib.al/4LyOK09

item.title:
最新消息：美国海军陆战队表示，加利福尼亚州的搜救人员正在寻找一架失踪的直升机，机上载有五名海军陆战队员。
这架直升机于周二晚从内华达州飞往加利福尼亚州。
item.description:
BREAKING: California search and rescue crews are looking for a missing helicopter with five Marines aboard, the U.S. Marine Corps said.

The helicopter was en route from Nevada to California Tuesday night. trib.al/xgG12sk

item.title:
最新消息：美国海军陆战队表示，加利福尼亚州的搜救人员正在寻找一架失踪的直升机，机上载有五名海军陆战队员。
这架直升机于周二晚从内华达州飞往加利福尼亚州。
item.description:
BREAKING: California search and rescue crews are looking for a missing helicopter with five Marines aboard, the U.S. Marine Corps said.

The helicopter was en route from Nevada to California Tuesday night. trib.al/aUEc0uA

item.title:
从 "火热奇多"（Flam' Hot Cheetos）到 "甜热星爆"（Sweet Heat Starburst），美国的零食越来越辣。现在，可口可乐也想加入这一潮流。
这家饮料巨头推出了 Coca-Cola Spiced，这是其北美产品组合三年来首次推出新的永久性产品。
item.description:
From Flamin’ Hot Cheetos to Sweet Heat Starburst, America’s snacks are getting spicier. Now, Coca-Cola wants in on the trend.

The beverage giant introduced Coca-Cola Spiced, the first new permanent offering to its North American portfolio in three years. trib.al/FwGSr67
